titles.title: A bill for the relief of William D. Benoni.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/31/1988--Introduced. Confers jurisdiction upon the U.S. District Court for the District of Massachusetts, or another district in which a named railroad corporation does business, to review and render judgment on a Public Law Board decision with respect to the discharge of a named individual from his employment with such corporation.
